function.name: search_internet_google
function.description: Search the internet using Google (via web scraping). Use this when you need to find current information with Google's search results. May have better quality results than DuckDuckGo. Returns a list of search results with titles and URLs.

query.description: The search query. Be specific and clear about what you're looking for.

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-20). Defaults to 5.
